jcr:content.jcr:title: List of United States state prisons

contentheadline.headline: List of United States state prisons

contentrichtext.text: {{seealso|list of U.S. federal prisons|list of U.S. military prisons}} {{details3|[[list of prisons]]|prisons in other countries}} This is a '''list of U.S. State [[prison]]s (2010)''' (not including [[List of U.S. federal prisons|federal prisons]] or county jails in the United States or prisons in U.S. territories): [[Image:Usa-green.png|Map of the U.S. states]]<br> {| |- | * [[List of Alabama state prisons|Alabama]] * [[List of Alaska state prisons|Alaska]] * [[List of Arizona state prisons|Arizona]] * [[List of Arkansas state prisons|Arkansas]] * [[List of California state prisons|California]] * [[List of Colorado state prisons|Colorado]] * [[List of Connecticut state prisons|Connecticut]] * [[List of Delaware state prisons|Delaware]] * [[List of Florida state prisons|Florida]] * [[List of Georgia state prisons|Georgia]] | * [[List of Hawaii state prisons|Hawaii]] * [[List of Idaho state prisons|Idaho]] * [[List of Illinois state prisons|Illinois]] * [[List of Indiana state prisons|Indiana]] * [[List of Iowa state prisons|Iowa]] * [[List of Kansas state prisons|Kansas]] * [[List of Kentucky state prisons|Kentucky]] * [[List of Louisiana state prisons|Louisiana]] * [[List of Maine state prisons|Maine]] * [[List of Maryland state prisons|Maryland]] | * [[List of Massachusetts state correctional facilities|Massachusetts]]<ref>Officially, these are "correctional facilities," or "correctional institutions," the term "state prison" being reserved for the facility at Cedar Junction in [[Walpole, Massachusetts|Walpole]].</ref> * [[List of Michigan state prisons|Michigan]] * [[List of Minnesota state prisons|Minnesota]] * [[List of Mississippi state prisons|Mississippi]] * [[List of Missouri state prisons|Missouri]] * [[List of Montana state prisons|Montana]] * [[List of Nebraska state prisons|Nebraska]] * [[List of Nevada state prisons|Nevada]] * [[List of New Hampshire state prisons|New Hampshire]] * [[List of New Jersey state prisons|New Jersey]] | * [[List of New Mexico state prisons|New Mexico]] * [[List of New York state prisons|New York]] * [[List of North Carolina state prisons|North Carolina]] * [[List of North Dakota state prisons|North Dakota]] * [[List of Ohio state prisons|Ohio]] * [[List of Oklahoma state prisons|Oklahoma]] * [[List of Oregon prisons and jails|Oregon]] * [[List of Pennsylvania state prisons|Pennsylvania]] * [[List of Rhode Island state prisons|Rhode Island]] * [[List of South Carolina state prisons|South Carolina]] | * [[List of South Dakota state prisons|South Dakota]] * [[List of Tennessee state prisons|Tennessee]] * [[List of Texas state prisons|Texas]] * [[List of Utah state prisons|Utah]] * [[List of Vermont state prisons|Vermont]] * [[List of Virginia state prisons|Virginia]] * [[List of Washington state prisons|Washington]] * [[List of West Virginia state prisons|West Virginia]] * [[List of Wisconsin state prisons|Wisconsin]] * [[List of Wyoming state prisons|Wyoming]] |} ==See also== * [[Incarceration in the United States]] == Notes == {{reflist}} ==External links== {{sister project links|prison}} {{Incarceration in the United States}}
